SELECT TUS.ID, TUS.V_USER_ID, TAS.ID ACCOUNT_SHOW_ID, TBT.ID BOND_ID, TBT.V_WX_RECEIVABLES, TBT.V_ALI_RECEIVABLES, TPA.V_APP_ID, TPA.V_PAY_MODEL, TBT.V_COUNT_RECEIVABLES, TBT.V_SURPLUS_BOND, TPA.ID PAY_ID, TFT.ID FILE_ID, TFT.V_PATH, TFT.V_NAME, TAS.V_ORDER_NUM, TAS.V_ACCOUNT_ID FROM T_USER_SHOW TUS LEFT JOIN T_BOND_TODAY TBT ON TUS.V_USER_ID = TBT.V_USER_ID LEFT JOIN T_ACCOUNT_SHOW TAS ON TUS.V_USER_ID = TAS.V_USER_ID LEFT JOIN T_PAY_ACCOUNT TPA ON TAS.V_ACCOUNT_ID = TPA.ID LEFT JOIN T_FILE_TAB TFT ON TPA.V_FILE_ID = TFT.ID LEFT JOIN T_ACCOUNT_COLLECTION TAC ON TAS.V_ACCOUNT_ID = TAC.V_ACCOUNT_ID
TUS.V_IS_PAY ='Y' AND (TBT.V_SURPLUS_BOND - TBT.V_LOCK_MONEY) >= #{V_MONEY} AND TPA.V_IS_MATCH = 'Y' AND TPA.V_PAY_TYPE =#{V_PAY_TYPE} AND (TPA.V_PAY_TOTAL = #{V_MONEY} OR TPA.V_PAY_TOTAL = '0.00') AND TPA.V_IS_LOCK = 'N' AND TPA.V_PAY_ACCOUNT IS NOT NULL AND TPA.V_PAY_NO IS NOT NULL
order by tus.V_USER_LEVEL,tus.V_PAY_TIME,tas.V_PAY_TIME

select tus.ID,tus.V_USER_ID,tas.ID ACCOUNT_SHOW_ID,tbt.ID BOND_ID,tbt.V_WX_RECEIVABLES,tbt.V_ALI_RECEIVABLES,tpa.V_APP_ID,tpa.V_PAY_MODEL ,tbt.V_COUNT_RECEIVABLES,tbt.V_SURPLUS_BOND,tpa.ID PAY_ID,tft.ID FILE_ID,tft.V_PATH,tft.V_NAME, tas.V_ORDER_NUM,tas.V_ACCOUNT_ID from t_user_show tus left join t_bond_today tbt on tus.V_USER_ID = tbt.V_USER_ID left join t_account_show tas on tus.V_USER_ID = tas.V_USER_ID left join t_pay_account tpa on tas.V_ACCOUNT_ID = tpa.ID left join t_file_tab tft on tpa.V_FILE_ID= tft.ID left join t_account_collection tac on tas.V_ACCOUNT_ID = tac.V_ACCOUNT_ID
tus.V_IS_PAY ='Y' and (tbt.V_SURPLUS_BOND - tbt.V_LOCK_MONEY) >= #{V_MONEY} and tas.V_PAY_NUM > 0 and tpa.V_IS_MATCH = 'Y' and tpa.V_PAY_TYPE =#{V_PAY_TYPE} and (tpa.V_PAY_TOTAL = #{V_MONEY} or tpa.V_PAY_TOTAL = '0.00') and tpa.V_IS_LOCK = 'N'
AND tpa.V_PAY_MODEL = #{V_PAY_MODEL}
order by tus.V_USER_LEVEL,tus.V_PAY_TIME,tas.V_PAY_TIME
